content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No persistent structures have been successfully created on the map. Although multiple attempts were made to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), all efforts failed because the required Lab was not available in the inventory. Other retrieved entities—such as the furnaces used for smelting iron and copper—were utilized in production processes rather than established as constructed, stand‐alone structures.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval:
 – When calling get_entities, avoid supplying unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. "radius") or an incorrect number of positional arguments. Always verify the function’s signature.
• Iterating over a None value:
 – Before iterating over results from get_entities, ensure the returned value is not None.
• Lab placement failures:
 – Confirm that the required Lab item exists in the inventory before attempting to place it.
• Failures in Lab crafting due to unavailable sub-ingredients:
 – Verify that production chains for intermediate components (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are fully established and that all required resources are available prior to initiating Lab crafting.
